abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton is heavily referencing her husband's economic record as president as part of her campaign strategy, pointing out rising wages and job growth during his terms and linking economic downturns to Republicans.
lead_paragraph: Leaning on her husband’s record of lifting wages and creating jobs, Mrs. Clinton is castigating Republicans for policies she says led to the downturns that Mr. Clinton and President Obama inherited.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Confidently Embraces Bill Clinton’s Economic Record
headline.print_headline: Clinton Confidently Embracing Her Husband’s Economic Record

snippet: Leaning on her husband’s record of lifting wages and creating jobs, Mrs. Clinton is castigating Republicans for policies she says led to the downturns that Mr. Clinton and President Obama inherited.
